entry.title: Friday night: Rain. Temperature rising to 6 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Rain ending after midnight then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Fog patches developing early this evening and dissipating near midnight. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Temperature rising to 6 this evening then falling. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
